PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05692017-06-02,  ,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under Sections 140, 209 and 286.1 of the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER SECTIONS 140, 209 and 286.1 OF CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to (1) improve the clarity and consistency of the regulatory texts; (2) align the English and French versions of the regulations; (3) update references of external standards.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0110 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
